When I go to bed, I listen to illusion. When I go on a long car ride, I listen to illusion.
If you're with her, what have you (actually) done for your community? Or have you been too busy being entertained/distracted?
It takes more than a trending tweet to accomplish anything. Remember that your heroes have people tweet for them while they take action.
If you want to #MakeAmericaGreatAgain, then start with yourself.
Continue to put faith in others above belief in yourself at your own (most certain) peril.
People look to their political celebrity leaders for quick and easy solutions to infinitely complex problems. Look to yourself for answers.
The anti-Clinton hysteria is just as dangerous as the nationalist pro-Trump hysteria. We're all totally fucked. Where's the dialogue?
